data.title: Delon Wright - Men's Basketball
data.meta_description: Delon Wright (55) G  -         2013-14         First Team All-Pac 12, the first in Utah program history ... Pac-12 All-Defensive First        Team choice ... NABC
data.text:
2013-14

First Team All-Pac 12, the first in Utah program history ... Pac-12 All-Defensive First Team choice ... NABC All-District second team ... USBWA All-District VIII selection ... Pac-12 Player of the Week for Jan. 20 ... Selected to compete at the Lebron James Skills Academy in July '14 ... Led the league in steals with 2.56 per contest and minutes played (38.61) ... Ranked third in the Pac-12 in field-goal percentage, connecting on 56.1 percent of his shots ... Ranked third in assists at 4.89 and fifth in assist-to-turnover ratio at 2.07 ... Despite being a guard, ranked sixth in blocked shots with 1.3 per game ... Finished seventh in the league in scoring at 16.9 points per game...Was ninth in free-throw percentage at 80.5 percent ... 12th in the league in rebounding with 6.8 caroms per game (eighth in defensive boards, 5.52 rpg) ... Started every game for the Utes in his first season ... Scored a career-high 27 points to go with 11 rebounds in a contest at Washington ... Finished with 23 points and a personal-best 12 assists in a win over Fresno State ... Finished with 17 points, 11 rebounds and a career-high seven steals at Colorado ... Accrued a double-double in his first collegiate game with 17 points and 10 rebounds vs. Evergreen State ... Notched a double-double with 15 points and 11 rebounds at Boise State ... Had 23 points and seven assists in a win over Ball State ... Scored 22 points, grabbed six rebounds and picked up six steals in a win over USC ... Had 21 points (career-high two three-pointers) and six rebounds at Arizona State ... Finished one rebound shy of a double-double with 20 points (career-high 10 free-throws) and nine rebounds in a win at USC ... In his second game vs. ASU, he scored 22 points and grabbed nine rebounds ... Amassed 21 points and five rebounds in a win over Colorado ... Scored 19 points and grabbed six rebounds at No. 1 Arizona ... Had 19 points and five assists in a win over Washington ... Finished with 17 points and five rebounds vs. Grand Canyon ... Finished with 16 points and seven assists in a win over rival BYU and at UCLA ... In his first Pac-12 Tournament contest, scored 15 points and grabbed seven rebounds in a win over UW ... Finished with 15 points and six rebounds in a win over Idaho State ... Had 14 points and seven rebounds in games vs. OSU and at WSU ... Totaled 14 points, six rebounds and a career-high four blocks vs. No. 10 Oregon ... Totaled a career-high 17 rebounds against St. Katherine ... Picked up 13 points and three rebounds in a win over Texas State ... Wound up with 12 points and nine rebounds vs. UC Davis ... Finished with 12 points and eight rebounds vs. No. 25 UCLA and at Stanford ... Had 12 points and five rebounds against No. 4 Arizona and Savannah State ... Narrowly missed double-doubles with 11 points and nine assists vs. WSU and 11 points with nine rebounds at Cal, both Utah wins ... Scored in double figures against Grand Canyon, Lamar and in the NIT vs. St. Mary's

Prior to Utah

Coast Conference Player of the Year at City College of San Francisco... selected All-State First Team...led the Rams to the Coast Conference North Division Title with a 27-3 record...averaged approximately 10 points, eight rebounds and four steals per game while also leading the Rams in blocks, steals and assists...led Levzinger High School to the California State Championship...named the CIF Southern Section Div. 1A Player of the Year and second-team all-state as a senior...chose the Utes after being recruited by Washington, Washington State, St. Mary's and Gonzaga
